solution_line_template: The number of apples in the orchard which were rotten is {rotten_percentage}*{total_apples} = <<{rotten_percentage}*{total_apples}={rotten_apples}>>{rotten_apples}
Out of the {rotten_apples} rotten apples, {smelling_percentage}*{rotten_apples} = <<{smelling_percentage}*{rotten_apples}={smelling_rotten_apples}>>{smelling_rotten_apples} were smelling.

The number of rotten apples in the orchard which were not smelling is {rotten_apples}-{smelling_rotten_apples} = <<{rotten_apples}-{smelling_rotten_apples}={non_smelling_rotten_apples}>>{non_smelling_rotten_apples}
